instruktioner: Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in heavy cream and let it simmer.
Add parmesan cheese and stir until melted.
Toss cooked pasta with the sauce.
Serve hot.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add tomatoes and red wine.
Let it simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve over pasta.
Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
In a pan, heat oil and sauté garlic and onions.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, cornstarch, and water.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and mix well.
Let it simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.
Season shrimp with salt and pepper.
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat butter and olive oil.
Sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Pour in lemon juice and let it simmer.
Toss cooked pasta with the shrimp and sauce.
Serve hot.
Slice beef into thin strips.
In a pan, heat butter and sauté onions.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir.
Add beef broth and let it simmer.
Stir in sour cream.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.
In a pot, heat butter and sauté onions and garlic.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Let it simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth.
Pour the soup back into the pot.
Add heavy cream and stir.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with croutons.
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a blender, mix basil, garlic, parmesan cheese, pine nuts, salt, and pepper.
Slowly pour in olive oil while blending.
Toss cooked pasta with the pesto sauce.
Serve hot with extra parmesan cheese.
In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Add arborio rice and stir until coated.
Pour in white wine and let it evaporate.
Add chicken broth one cup at a time while stirring occasionally.
Let it simmer until rice is cooked and creamy.
Stir in butter and parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.
Slice beef into thin strips.
Cut broccoli into small florets.
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, cornstarch, and water.
In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add broccoli and stir fry for 3-5 minutes.
Pour the sauce over the beef and broccoli.
Let it simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with rice.
